revised_title: Anatomical Study of Neck Muscles and Ligaments
tldr: The author, M. Dupre, describes the anatomy of neck muscles and ligaments, focusing on five pairs of muscles and two ligaments involved in head and neck movements. He also provides a case study of an uncommon appearance of a human skull with a tumor. This research aims to contribute to a better understanding of the musculoskeletal system and improve knowledge of human anatomy.
